website_summaries.verdict: The best solution for portable formula mixing. Allows you to stir and mix the powder and water without extra equipment.
pros: Functions as a complete baby bottle with the additional capability to mix the drink before consumption
The bottle is comfortable to hold for older babies
Bottle nipple is chemical-free and help reduce colic
cons: Bulky and heavy compared to traditional baby bottles

customer_reviews.title: Stay away ! Rubber wearing off
customer_reviews.text: Received my order on Saturday . I washed it to try it for the FIRST me today, and to my surprise it seems I have received a used or damaged product. The lid of the formula compartment is wearing off part of material is eroding . There is also a small hole in the botton of the compartment too. It is very irresponsible to use such cheap material endangering the lives of our little ones. I am very disappointed and I want a REFUND. If you do take the risk and order this MIXIE JUNK do inspect it carefully.
customer_reviews.author: rs

customer_reviews.title: Works with Phillips avent barrow nipples
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are AMAZING!!!! So easy so convenient! I use them when we are on the go.... they are easy to clean I rinse with hot soapy water and then put them in my advent bottle steamer. They are a little taller then my other bottles but fit in the bottle steamer easily. They also work perfect with the Phillips avent nipples the narrow ones not the wide mouth bottle ones (if you use the Phillips bottles I’m sure you understand which ones I mean). The bottles will leak if u don’t tighten them enough I learned that the hard way. But once I screwed the bottom and the top on tight no leaking. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the idea of it... However I wish it had an option for a sippy spout. I have tried it with MAM, go glass, and any other sippy nipple that seemed like it would fit. None of them do. It leaks everywhere constantly, and by the time I'm done mixing and with all that leaks out as my baby is drinking, I'm lucky if she gets 2/3 of her milk. I've never used the normal nipple it comes with (my baby hates them), but hopefully it doesn't normally leak everywhere. 2 stars for the great idea, and hoping there is a sippy option soon...

No worries about stumbling to the kitchen and spilling formula everywhere in your tired state! I wish I had discovered these earlier! The flow of the nipples are a bit faster than then Dr Browns we use, so we used the #1 nipple on these longer than we did the dr Browns.

I would recommend this bottle!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing concept, but could use some improvement
customer_reviews.text: Amazing concept, but could use some improvement. However, my 6 month old has trouble getting milk out Perhaps buying the faster flow nipple might help, but I find that the suction becomes too much and the nipple caves in on itself as she's drinking. In other words, there doesn't seem to be adequate ventilation. If they could come out with a new, more ventilated version, I would give it 5 stars.

I was a little skeptical at first, especially because the "lid" floats around in the bottle, but everything works easily and the lid does prevent clumping. I'm so glad to have found these, especially because they are so much cheaper than their competitors.
